sentences.cn: 复杂得难以想象的问题
拜占庭式复杂诡秘死板的机构

sentences.en: Complexity is related to surface irregularities, surface texture, fuzziness, and weave.
sentences.cn: 至于复杂性与表面的不规则性, 表面结构, 毛羽程度和织造加工有关.

sentences.en: Electronic engine control system can range in complexity.
sentences.cn: 发动机电子在控制系统可按其复杂程度分类.

sentences.en: He was buffaloed by the complexity of the problem.
sentences.cn: 他被问题的复杂性弄得昏头昏脑.

sentences.en: International law is a minefield for anyone not familiar with its complexity.
sentences.cn: 国际法这一领域,不熟悉其复杂性则寸步难行.

sentences.en: It is difficult to convey the sheer complexity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 很难说清楚形势究竟有多复杂.

sentences.en: Only now did he understand the full complexity of the problem.
sentences.cn: 直到现在他才明白这一问题的全部复杂性.

sentences.en: The complexity of the road map puzzled me.
sentences.cn: 错综复杂的公路图把我搞糊涂了.

sentences.en: the increasing complexity of modern telecommunication systems
sentences.cn: 日益复杂的现代电信系统

sentences.en: The rate of reannealing is inversely proportion to sequence complexity.
sentences.cn: 再退火速度是和顺序复杂性成反比例.

sentences.en: This argument, being purely logical, applies to scientific predictors of any complexity.
sentences.cn: 这个纯逻辑的论点适用于各种各样的科学预测者.

sentences.en: Within that field we have to face a somewhat bewildering complexity.
sentences.cn: 在这一领域内,我们必须面对一种颇令人困惑的复杂情况.

sentences.en: Worsted systems show more complexity and variety than cotton systems.
sentences.cn: 精梳毛纺系统看来比棉纺系统更复杂化,更多样化.
